revised_title: Influence of Color on Heat and Odor Absorption
tldr: The author investigates the influence of color on heat absorption and odor absorption using various materials such as wool, silk, and cotton. The results show that black materials have the highest heat absorption and odor absorption, while white materials have the lowest. The study also reveals that the loss of heat by radiation follows the same order as its absorption, with black materials having the highest radiation loss.
